author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
SECRET PASSAGES has released it's right two issues, an exploration of Classic Tabletop games! Let's check it out!

Check out SECRET PASSAGES in Digital HERE: https://www.drivethrurpg.com/en/product/515358/secret-passages-1-an-old-school-rpg-and-oldhammer-magazine?affiliate_id=210041

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the CoOp can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames 

Want to challenge Ash to a game? Email him at GuerrillaMiniatureGames@gmail.com or message him through his Facebook Page!

Follow Ash on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/outofthebasementintothestreets

All Jingles and Music by Kevin McLeod: https://incompetech.com
title: GMG REVIEWS: SECRET PASSAGES - Vol. 1& 2

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
The original SPACE PIRATES of Warhammer 40,000 are back with a new Codex and a Character. Five detachments let you lean into each of the main factions of Commorragh and a Haemonculus led Combat Patrol rounds out the offer of bundled savings boxes for the new launch. Let's check it out. 

Thanks to GW for the copy of the Book and Boxes to review. 

#AdWIP
#new40k 
#WarhammerCommunity

GMG is publicly supported. Become a backer on Patreon to ensure new content and that the Studio can continue: https://www.patreon.com/guerrillaminiaturegames

title: GMG Reviews - CODEX: Drukhari by Games Workshop

author: Guerrilla Miniature Games
description:
Welcome to For Whom the Bell Crows, a Podcast for Corvus Belli's Fantasy Skirmish game WARCROW!

Cohosts Ben and Ash will be talking about the current state of the game, how to get into it and why this is probably the best 'jumping in' point for a Miniature Wargame to be at in it's life-cycle. Let's go!

Check it out on your usual PODCAST APPS HERE:
